Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to responses to noise complaints
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to public access to noise mitigation plans
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Public access to noise mitigation plans.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass and the President to sign legislation that would require the Federal Aviation Administration to reduce the threshold for what constitutes a significant noise impact under the Federal Aviation Regulation, Part 150, Airport Noise Compatibility Planning Program, from 65 Day-Night Decibels to 55 Day-Night Decibels
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Federal Aviation Administration to reduce the threshold for what constitutes a significant noise impact.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to public access to noise mitigation plans
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Public access to noise mitigation plans.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to responses to noise complaints
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Congress to pass and the President to sign legislation that would require the Federal Aviation Administration to reduce the threshold for what constitutes a significant noise impact under the Federal Aviation Regulation, Part 150, Airport Noise Compatibility Planning Program, from 65 Day-Night Decibels to 55 Day-Night Decibels
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Federal Aviation Administration to reduce the threshold for what constitutes a significant noise impact.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Kallos and Garodnick
